content:
Don't you feel the love in the air! Well during PE while Natsuhiko was doing some laps was sitting at the bleachers. He then game to me and sat beside me to rest. Oop!

Although thick sweat was rolling of him, the sun made his skin glimmer. The sweat trapped his shirt together leaving nothing but the outline of his masular figure. (/≧▽≦)/

After a few seconds of silence, he decided to ask me out! JAAHHHHH! THIS CAN'T BE HAPPENING. So i agreed. It was best day of my life. ⊙﹏⊙∥

... and probably for Mr. Hojaru and Mr. Ren. Mr Hojaru gave Mr. Ren a bouquet of flowers. What a sweet gesture!
